content: If he starts to whirl his fiery blade in circles around him, be ready but don’t panic as his attack is yet to come — wait for him to raise the blade and twirl it high before swinging it from side to side in two slower hits.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangzhi.md', within the main section titled 'Guangzhi', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangzhi' and the sub-subsection 'Guangzhi Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
If he starts to whirl his fiery blade in circles around him, be ready but don’t panic as his attack is yet to come — wait for him to raise the blade and twirl it high before swinging it from side to side in two slower hits.
